article1.title: Article 1 (Definitions)
article1.description: The following terms are defined as follows in these Terms:

postsOperations.title: Posts/Operations/Sales
postsOperations.description: By registering as a creator, you can post and manage your content as well as track your sales.

other.title: Other reasons
other.logoutConfirmText: Are you sure you want to log out?

agreements.copyright: I have confirmed that the content of my post does not constitute copyright infringement or the publication of obscene materials.
agreements.minors: I have confirmed that my post does not contain images of minors, and does not include expressions that suggest minors.
agreements.censored: I have confirmed that all genitalia and penetration images have been censored appropriately.

footerText.thankYou: Thank you for your cooperation to ensure that our platform is safe and secure.
footerText.lineone: Please ensure that your published content complies with our
footerText.linetwo: Uploading the content of other people is an infringement of copyright and is punishable by up to 10 years in prison or a fine of up to 10 million yen.
footerText.linethree: Please do not publish content that has not been censored with mosaic processing, as this constitutes the distribution of obscene materials and is a criminal offense.
footerText.linefour: In the event that you fail to censor genitalia or penetration images, all your posts may be deleted.
footerText.buttonclick: Click here for help with publishing a post
footerText.linepost: Your post has been published successfully and is now live for your followers to see.

ageVerification.warning:
The next page contains adult content.
Access by persons under the age of 18 is strictly prohibited.
ageVerification.question: Are you 18 years old or older?
ageVerification.underageMessage: Persons under the age of 18 are not allowed to use this service

emailVerification.title: Your email address has not been verified yet.
emailVerification.sentInfo: We have sent an email with a confirmation link to the email address you entered. Please check for it.
emailVerification.cooperation: We appreciate your cooperation in preventing fraudulent and malicious accounts.
emailVerification.notReceived: If you do not receive the confirmation email, please check the email address you entered (see {link}) and resend the confirmation email.
emailVerification.spamSettings: Please ensure that the spam settings of your email software or email provider allow you to receive from the myfans domain.
emailVerification.fromAddress: The verification email will be sent from noreply@myfans.jp.
emailVerification.moreInfo: For information about other possible problems, {link}.
